occurrences module¶

  • count
  • get
  • search

Load¶

from pygbif import occurrences

Example Usage¶

occurrences.search(taxonKey = 3329049)
occurrences.get(taxonKey = 252408386)
occurrences.count(isGeoreferenced = True)
